name: Starsepsten
description:
Starsepsten is a flying racing game set in the sci-fi floating city. Try to get the best time going through checkpoints around the downtown and down the town.

Features:

  • Pilot the flying car
  • Collect boosters
  • Avoid EMP zones 
  • Maneuver through buildings and other vehicles

Created by:

  • Daniil Chebotkov
